# Paradex Docs

Welcome to the Paradex documentation repository! This is where all the documentation for Paradex lives.

## About Paradex

Paradex is a decentralized trading platform that allows users to trade digital assets directly from their wallets. It offers a secure, transparent, and efficient trading experience by leveraging blockchain technology. Paradex aims to provide a seamless and user-friendly interface for both novice and experienced traders.


## Connect with Us

[![Discord](https://img.shields.io/badge/Join%20our%20Discord-7289DA?logo=discord&logoColor=white)](https://discord.gg/paradex)

## Contributing

We welcome contributions from the community!

- To submit an issue, please use the [issue tracker](https://github.com/tradeparadex/paradex-docs/issues/new/choose).
- For more detailed guidelines, please refer to the [CONTRIBUTING](CONTRIBUTING.md) file.
